entry.title: Post de prueba
entry.content:
Status Meeting, November 30th, 2012.

  • Place: Laboratorio Sistemas distribuidos, F-119, UTFSM.
  • Date: 14:00 CLST/ block 7-8.
  • Responsible:
  • Assistant:
  • Absent:

Projects

  • PIE>A, Radio TLEGOscope
    • LEGO pieces to buy.
  • ALS (Main.JoaoFuentes)
  • Software Development
    • ACSCB (Main.JoaoFuentes)
  • LIRAE Electronics Group (Main.SebastianZuniga and Main.AlexMedina)

Agenda

  • Management (Main.KatherineTorrejon)
    • Natalia Olave.
    • Barbara Saavedra.
    • Cristian Aguilar.
  • Courses 2012 (Main.JonathanAntognini)
    • Phyton
    • SQL
  • Misc
    • Summer Jobs
    • Webpage for LIRAE (lirae.cl). (Main.VictorGonzalez)
      • No major updates, only a few minor improvements for the spanish-english framework.
    • Webpage for CSRG (csrg.cl). (Main.VictorGonzalez)
      • The CMS (Content Management System), to be installed is Octopress, a git based publishing system with markup support for the published content.
      • Access to the csrg.cl server provided by Main.SergioMorales.
      • Server is unreachable since wednesday for unknown reasons (Sergio has been told of this in thursday at night).
      • Development testing is being done at my personal Github account.
